host.label: Host IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the URL of the STIX Bundle JSON file so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the Host name or IP

help.label: Help
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

limit.label: Result Size Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of entries or objects that are returned by search query.The default result size limit is 1000. The value must not be less than 1 and must not be greater than 10,000.

timeout.label: Query Timeout Limit
timeout.description: The time limit in minutes for how long the query is run on the data source. The default time limit is 1. When the value is set to zero, there is no timeout. If the query takes longer than 1 min, it is likely to indicate a problem.

concurrent.label: Concurrent Search Limit
concurrent.description: The number of simultaneous connections that can be made between Cloud Pak for Security and the data source. The default limit for the number of connections is 4.

username.label: Username
username.description: Username with access to the search API

password.label: Password
password.description: Password of the user with access to the search API
